channel.title: How good is this VPS?
channel.description:
So yeah, I were thinking of buying a VPS, it's much more convenient than having to run the computer 24/7. I found this kinda cheap one but I got no experience of VPS's whatsoever, can someone tell me if this is good or bad.
OS: Windows 2008 Web Edition 64-bit Processor: 2.4 GHz Xeon RAM Memory: 384 MB Storage: 15GB
Transport, Internet and infrastructure Traffic Transfer: 100 Mbit internet, traffic 150Gb/Month Own IP Address: 1, more optional Firewall: Optional Antispam: Optional SLA: Daytime - can be upgraded Snapshots: Yes, 1 Each
Backup Backup: Yes
P.S* this was originally in swedish, i used google translate to translate the words xD

So yeah, I were thinking of buying a VPS, it’s much more convenient than having to run the computer 24/7.
